<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/themes/getActiveAdminTheme"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the currently active administrative theme if theming is initialized.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
